com.javagameengine.assets.material

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.assets.NativeObject
      • com.javagameengine.assets.material.Material
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bindable

    public class Material
extends NativeObject
implements Bindable
    Material defines a material composed of Textures and Shaders that can be applied to Renderable objects and rendered in the rendering queue. Implements the Bindable interface. Is a NativeObject, as the shading program with associated uniforms can be stored as a GPU state.
